<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the filename for given object.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#a6646a556e7732c3d1037047b4bb4ee7e"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#a9cfe13a99c14005ccbf4e6b653713f0e">LVReader::getFilename</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvobject">LVObject</a> &#42;Object, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: The current CodeView Reader implementation does not have support</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for multiple compile units. Until we have a proper offset calculation,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// check only in the current compile unit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CompileUnits.size()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get Compile Unit for the given object.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    LVCompileUnits::const&#95;iterator Iter =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::prev(CompileUnits.lower&#95;bound(Object-&gt;getOffset()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Iter != CompileUnits.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Iter-&gt;second-&gt;getFilename(Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#aabd8bf25dbcb16ca9fa57ef73d062006">CompileUnit</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#aabd8bf25dbcb16ca9fa57ef73d062006">CompileUnit</a>-&gt;getFilename(Index) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The Reader is the module that creates the logical view using the debug</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// information contained in the binary file specified in the command line.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the main entry point for the Reader and performs the following</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// steps:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Process any patterns collected from the &#39;--select&#39; options.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - For each compile unit in the debug information:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; Create the logical elements (scopes, symbols, types, lines).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; Collect debug ranges and debug locations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; Move the collected logical lines to their associated scopes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Once all the compile units have been processed, traverse the scopes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   tree in order to:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; Calculate symbol coverage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; Detect invalid ranges and locations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; &quot;resolve&quot; the logical elements. During this pass, the names and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      file information are updated, to reflect any dependency with other</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     logical elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#a8a15ec2eff468d1dc1137a8a8f20f525"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logicalview/lvreader/#a8a15ec2eff468d1dc1137a8a8f20f525">LVReader::doLoad</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set current Reader instance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
